title: WordPress SEO by Yoast - WordPress Plugin
description:
Improve your WordPress SEO: Write better content and have a fully optimized WordPress site using Yoast's WordPress SEO plugin. Contains external links in wp-seo-main.php, these can easily be removed before installation.

This plugin is written from the ground up by Joost de Valk and his team at Yoast to improve your site's SEO on all needed aspects. While this WordPress SEO plugin goes the extra mile to take care of all the technical optimization, it first and foremost helps you write better content. WordPress SEO forces you to choose a focus keyword when you're writing your articles, and then makes sure you use that focus keyword everywhere.

Requires: 3.9 or higher
Compatible up to: 4.2.2
Last Updated: 2015-4-21

Installation:

# Optional: remove external links from wp-seo-main.php
# Upload the wordpress-seo folder to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
# Activate the WordPress SEO plugin through the 'Plugins' menu in WordPress
# Configure the plugin by going to the SEO menu that appears in your admin menu
